com.apusplay.sdk.pay

接口 IabPay.OnQueryInventoryListener

  • 所有超级接口:
    OnCompletedListener<RequestResult,Inventory>
    封闭类:
    IabPay

    public static interface IabPay.OnQueryInventoryListener
extends OnCompletedListener<RequestResult,Inventory>
    Listener that notifies when an inventory query operation completes.

    • 方法概要

      Fulfill the inventory if necessary If pay type is SdkConstants.PAY_TYPE_GOOGLE_IAB , do nothing Else , provide the SkuList in two ways: 1.

    • 方法详细资料

      • fulfillInventory

        void fulfillInventory(Inventory inventory)
        Fulfill the inventory if necessary If pay type is SdkConstants.PAY_TYPE_GOOGLE_IAB , do nothing Else , provide the SkuList in two ways: 1. Add Sku to the inventory via inv.add(Sku) recursively 2. Set the customized SkuHolder to the inventory ((IabInventory)inv).setSkuHolder(getSkuHolder()); protected void fulfillInventory(Inventory inv) { if(getPayConfig().getPayType().equalsIgnoreCase(SdkConstants.PAY_TYPE_GOOGLE_IAB)){ // GOOGLE IAB mode // The inventory retrieved from Google Play // No need further handling // } else { // NONE GOOGLE IAB mode // Please add your SKUs if not the GOOGLE IAB mode // Because demonstrate both pay approaches: GOOGLE IAB and PAY GATEWAY, we use same set of items // // Option 1, add Sku to inventory directly // Sku sku = null; // // sku = new MySku("premium","inapp","0.99",990000,"USD","premium (SdkDemo)","premium desc"); // inv.addSku(sku); // // sku = new MySku("gas","inapp","PHP46.33",46330000,"PHP","gas (SdkDemo)","gas"); // inv.addSku(sku); // // sku = new MySku("battery","inapp","PHP46.16",46160000,"PHP","Recharged Battery (SdkDemo)","Recharged Battery used to start motor and provide energy for electric appliance."); // inv.addSku(sku); // // sku = new MySku("infinite_gas_monthly","subs","PHP46.33",46330000,"PHP","infinite_gas_monthly (SdkDemo)","infinite_gas_monthly"); // inv.addSku(sku); // // sku = new MySku("infinite_gas_yearly","subs","PHP46.33",46330000,"PHP","infinite_gas_yearly (SdkDemo)","infinite_gas_yearly"); // inv.addSku(sku); // Option 2. if inv is IabInventory instance, can provide your own SkuHolder, which provide method to manipulate Sku items. if(inv instanceof IabInventory) ((IabInventory)inv).setSkuHolder(getSkuHolder()); } }
        参数:
        inventory -
